mapper.select:
select s.*, svd.version from software as s left join (select software_id, max(version) as version from software_version_download where version_type = 0 group by software_id ) as svd on s.software_id = svd.software_id where s.status = 1
and software_name like concat('%',#{softwareName},'%')
and tags like concat('%', #{tag}, '%')
limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from software as s left join (select software_id, max(version) as version from software_version_download where version_type = 0 group by software_id ) as svd on s.software_id = svd.software_id where status = 1
and software_name like concat('%',#{softwareName},'%')
and tags like concat('%', #{tag}, '%')

SELECT DISTINCT svd.software_id, svd.version_type, s.software_name, svd.price,s.software_image,s.description,s.create_time FROM software_version_download AS svd LEFT JOIN user_software_auth AS usa ON svd.software_id = usa.software_id AND svd.version_type = usa.version_type AND usa.user_id = #{userId} AND usa.expired_time > now() LEFT JOIN software AS s ON s.software_id = svd.software_id WHERE (svd.software_id, svd.version_type) != (usa.software_id, usa.version_type) OR (usa.software_id IS NULL AND usa.version_type IS NULL) and s.status = 1 LIMIT #{offset},24;

select svd.software_id,svd.version,svd.version_type,s.software_name,s.software_image from software_version_download as svd inner join user_software_download as usd on usd.user_id = #{userId} and svd.software_id = usd.software_id and svd.version_type = usd.version_type and svd.version != usd.version inner join software as s on svd.software_id = s.software_id where s.status = 1;
